alert.note: Alert for Fountain; Montgomery; Parke; Tippecanoe (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 31 at 10:29PM EDT until March 31 at 10:45PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN FOUNTAIN...SOUTHEASTERN TIPPECANOE...NORTH CENTRAL PARKE AND NORTHERN MONTGOMERY COUNTIES... At 1029 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Crawfordsville, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Linden around 1035 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Darlington and Clarks Hill. This includes the following highways... Interstate 65 between mile markers 161 and 162. Interstate 74 between mile markers 17 and 41. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 AM EDT for west central Indiana. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
